(2) Dragilor, de va zice cineva c iubeate pre Dumnezeu, iar pre fratele su
urate, acela mincinos iaste. (I NV: 512)
"Dear [paris hioners], if somebody says that he lov es God, but he hat es his brother, that
one is a liar."
